thread.title: SRK's 'Raees' gets Pakistan NOC, waiting for Censor nod - Entertainment
thread.title_full: SRK's 'Raees' gets Pakistan NOC, waiting for Censor nod - Entertainment

author: Bharati Dubey
title: SRK's 'Raees' gets Pakistan NOC, waiting for Censor nod - Entertainment

persons.name: fawad khan-starrer ae dil hai mushkil

text:
Pakistani actress Mahira Khan is the female lead in the SRK-starrer 
After Kaabil, Shah Rukh Khan's Raees is all set to release in Pakistan. The government has issued an NOC (No Objection Certificate) and now, the film is just awaiting clearance from the censor board of various territories of Pakistan.
The film's poster is already out on the websites of Pakistani cinema halls. A source from Pakistan said, "Punjab and Karachi Board have cleared the film without cuts. The Islamabad board is yet to clear the film, and they will be watching it on Monday. After that, the screens for the film will be decided."
At present, Kaabil is being screened in two shows, while the other shows being given to Karan Johar's Fawad Khan-starrer Ae Dil Hai Mushkil. The chairman of the Pakistan Censor Board, Mobashir Hasan, when contacted, said, "We are going to follow the due process. I would not know about the release date. For that, you should speak to the distributor."
